publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1559 Mr Jim Wallace: The Number of Inner House Judges (Variation) Order 2001—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft the Number of Inner House Judges (Variation) Order 2001 be approved. Supported by: Iain Gray*
